descriptionHtml:
A stand alone piece \"Tyrael\'s Shield\" inspired by Bright and Dark Tyrael Armor by KoRe. please check out his gear here http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8729
Love the set, I play 1 hand Shield warrior. I needed a shield that would go with this set, after I made it I wanted to share with you all. Craftable at the Skyforge *UNDER MISC*

Again if you are looking for the complete set made by KoRe please visit http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8729

Trouble getting it to work please check out this video http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SscPmV57JPw&feature=player_embedded

Due to Skyrims new HD pack its giving us modders alot of trouble retexturing and creating mods.
author: Mosdef the Most Definite
